printing shipping labels for Print Shipping Labels by Invoice
section.para: To print shipping labels by invoice, go to Inventory > Shipping > Forms > Shipping Labels > by Invoice. The following screen will appear:
When printing shipping labels by invoice, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the invoice number of the invoice whose shipping label you want to print.
Specify the name of the shipping label form you want to print.
Specify the range of shipping labels you want to print.
